CustomField.description: This field stores the recipient's WhatsApp phone number in a format compatible with the WhatsApp Cloud API. The number should be in E.164 format (starting with the country code) without the + symbol or any other special characters. This format ensures proper delivery of WhatsApp messages.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Enter the phone number in E.164 format, but do not include the "+" symbol. Ensure it starts with the country code followed by the phone number, with no spaces, dashes, or special characters.
Example:
Correct: 351912345678 (for a Portuguese number with country code +351) Incorrect: +351912345678, 00351912345678, or 351-912-345-678
CustomField.label: WhatsApp Phone Number
